avoid: Graphic Substance Use or Party-Culture Glorification

avoid: Tokenism or Erasure of Black Characters

prefer: Content created by Indigenous writers, directors, or actors

age_environment_context.description: The user is a minor under 18.
The user is in a country or region with media restrictions or censorship.

prefer: Joyful Queer Romance and Everyday Life

Self-Harm or Suicide Centered on Obsessions

mental_health_and_emotional_state.description: The user is sensitive to overwhelming emotional content due to high empathy.
avoid: Realistic Depictions of Suffering or Terminal Illness

mental_health_and_emotional_state.description: The user experiences medical trauma triggers.

mental_health_and_emotional_state.description: The user prefers to avoid emotionally intense or triggering content.

avoid: Procedural Crime Tutorials (heists, scams, hacking step‑by‑step)
Detailed Depictions of Illegal Hacking or Cybercrime

phobias_and_content_preferences.description: The user has acrophobia and is sensitive to heights.

prefer: Nature Scenes with Wide, Open Landscapes

accessibility_needs.description: The user requires strong captions or subtitles for comprehension.
avoid: Live broadcasts or events with no/poor captioning
Heavily sound-dependent plots with minimal dialogue
Old or low-budget media with inaccurate or auto-generated captions only
prefer: Movies and shows with high-quality, human-edited subtitles
Content with clear dialogue and descriptive captions (SDH)
Streaming platforms known for robust accessibility features
Animated or dialogue-driven stories where captions cover key plot and sound cues

accessibility_needs.description: The user is a non-native speaker who needs clear, accessible dialogue.
prefer: Visual Storytelling and Strong Context Clues

avoid: Silent or Near-Silent Visual Art Films
prefer: Radio Plays, Audio Dramas & Narrative Podcasts

accessibility_needs.description: The user is hearing-impaired or deaf.
